member.name: T:Reloaded.Assembler.Assembler
member.summary: Assembler class allows you to assemble X86 and X64 mnemonics using FASM.

member.name: M:Reloaded.Assembler.Assembler.#ctor(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Creates a new instance of the FASM assembler.
member.param: The minimum size of the buffer to be used for passing the text to be assembled to FASM Assembler.
The minimum size of the buffer to be used for FASM to return the text to be assembled.

member.name: M:Reloaded.Assembler.Assembler.GetVersion
member.summary: Retrieves the version of the internally used FASM assembler DLL.

member.name: M:Reloaded.Assembler.Assembler.Assemble(System.String[],System.UInt16)
member.param: The maximum number of passes to perform when assembling data.

member.name: M:Reloaded.Assembler.Assembler.Assemble(System.String,System.UInt16)
member.param: The mnemonics to assemble; delimited by new line \n for each new instruction.
The maximum number of passes to perform when assembling data.

member.name: M:Reloaded.Assembler.Assembler.Dispose
member.summary: Releases the allocated memory for the assembler.

member.name: M:Reloaded.Assembler.Assembler.AllocateText(System.Int32,System.Int32,Reloaded.Memory.Buffers.MemoryBufferHelper)
member.summary: Attempts to allocate the memory to store the text to be supplied to FASM assembler.

member.name: M:Reloaded.Assembler.Assembler.AllocateResult(System.Int32,System.Int32,Reloaded.Memory.Buffers.MemoryBufferHelper)
member.summary: Attempts to allocate the memory to store the result received from FASM assembler.

member.name: M:Reloaded.Assembler.Definitions.FasmException.#ctor(Reloaded.Assembler.Definitions.FasmErrors,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The line where the error has occured.
The offset within the data where the error line starts.
The assembled mnemonics when the error occurred.

member.name: F:Reloaded.Assembler.Definitions.FasmLineHeader.FilePathPtr
member.summary: 32bit pointer to the file path of the source file.

member.name: F:Reloaded.Assembler.Definitions.FasmLineHeader.MacroCallingFilePtr
member.summary: 32bit pointer to the LINE_HEADER structure for the line which called the macroinstruction.

member.name: F:Reloaded.Assembler.Definitions.FasmLineHeader.MacroLinePtr
member.summary: 32bit pointer to the LINE_HEADER structure for the line within the definition of macroinstruction, which generated this one.

member.name: M:Reloaded.Assembler.Definitions.FasmSimpleException.#ctor(Reloaded.Assembler.Definitions.FasmErrors,Reloaded.Assembler.Definitions.FasmResult)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: T:Reloaded.Assembler.Definitions.FasmState
member.summary: Defines the state of the FASM assembler after an assembly operation.

member.name: M:Reloaded.Assembler.Fasm32.GetVersion
member.summary: Returns the version of the FASM compiler inside FASM.DLL
member.returns: The return value is a double word containing the major version in lower 16 bits, and minor version in the higher 16 bits.

member.name: M:Reloaded.Assembler.Fasm64.GetVersion
member.summary: Returns the version of the FASM compiler inside FASM.DLL
member.returns: The return value is a double word containing the major version in lower 16 bits, and minor version in the higher 16 bits.
